description: This header file declares external boolean functions to query the hardware capabilities of a device, such as support for cellular, WiFi, Ethernet, Bluetooth, ZigBee, sounds, display, and clock alteration.

methods.name: supportCellularNetworks
methods.description: Checks if the device supports cellular radio communication.

methods.name: supportWifiNetworks
methods.description: Checks if the device has a WiFi radio.

methods.name: supportWifiAcessPointMode
methods.description: Checks if the WiFi radio can run in Access Point mode.

methods.name: supportEthernetNetworks
methods.description: Checks if the device has an accessible Ethernet network.

methods.name: supportBluetooth
methods.description: Checks if the device has a Bluetooth radio installed.

methods.name: supportZigBee
methods.description: Checks if the device has a ZigBee radio installed.

methods.name: supportSounds
methods.description: Checks if the device has an internal speaker capable of emitting audible tones.

methods.name: hasDisplayScreen
methods.description: Checks if the device has a display capable of presenting a user interface.

methods.name: supportClockAlteration
methods.description: Checks if the device can alter the system clock.
